NAME.Nominative: Wednesday of the Sixth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Wednesday of the Sixth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 5<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Deal with us according to Thy mercy, O Lord, and deliver us not up with our sins, O holy Master Almighty, we pray Thee.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O Lord, save your people, and bless Your inheritance
Praise the Lord, O ye servants, praise ye the name of the Lord.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Blessed be the name of the Lord from henceforth and for evermore.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Ye are blessed of the Lord,
Who made heaven and the earth.
SEXTE.STICHOS: The heaven of heaven belongeth to the Lord, but the earth He gave unto the sons of men.
